message: This is a fair offer. We both get something, and it's a good starting point for negotiation.

Alice, waiting costs us bothâ€”in my offer today, you receive $643000 and I $357000. This split reflects your bargaining strength if you were to propose in the next round (with less overall value given the slower discount for you) while sparing us further devaluation. I believe this is the fair, efficient resolution for both of us. Please accept.
